page.title: 17GALA HISTORY
page.content: Ratho's{Gala week}has been going on for about 50 years,though once it was stopped for 4 years because people from the nearby towns came and took over.They began to call it a{carnival} instead.Another reason the Gala was stopped was because of the 2nd World War.Then the villagers decided to start their own Gala again,following the carnival system by having it last 1 week,when before it was a Saturday afternoon.The{Gala Queen}has either been crowned by a farmer's wife or a teacher.In 1983 the Gala Queen was Zena Johnston and 1984 was Threslyn Duffy.Some people say the reason for it starting was to celebrate summer, others say it was a cultural affair for farmers to show off their cattle. Children used to get new clothes for the Gala because to every body it was a very special ocassion.
